alert.note: Alert for Southern Cook, North Shore; Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 05 at 1:53AM CST until January 07 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 6 AM CST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 7 inches. * WHERE...Southern Lake and Southern Cook Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Grand Portage Reservation. * WHEN...From noon today to 6 AM CST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Total snow accumulations will be over a 36 hour period from Friday afternoon to Sunday morning. The heaviest snowfall rates are expected Friday evening through Saturday afternoon. Greatest snow amounts expected along the higher terrain. Isolated areas of 7 inches or more are possible in the higher terrain of Cook County.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.

area.areaDesc: Southern Cook, North Shore; Southern Lake, North Shore
